name: AlternativeFact
0:
”Alexa, ask alternative fact for a fact”
”Alexa, tell alternative fact for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: alternative fact
des:
Make America Laugh Again! 

The most comprehensive list of true alternative facts are now available on your Amazon Echo Devices. Just ask Alexa about an alternative fact and be surprised of things you didn't know yet.

Say "Alexa, tell alternative fact" or just "Alexa, alternative fact" to get started.

Disclaimer: All alternative facts are not compatible with actual facts. This skill is for entertainment purposes only.
